content.p: There are a number of groups and workshops available for students, which provide a ‘communal’ type support experience. Sometimes students have an individual counselling session and are advised to try a workshop, or referred to one of the groups the service runs. For a workshop, the student can self-refer by signing up to one of the workshops below. For more infomation take a look at our workshop descriptions and our counselling groups. View events as list The Orchards University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD telephone: +44 (0)115 951 3695 email: counselling.service@nottingham.ac.uk
